item.title: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe
item.description: A Genius, Two Partners and a Dupe (Italian: Un genio, due compari, un pollo is a 1975 spaghetti western comedy film directed by Damiano Damiani and Sergio Leone, who directed the opening scene.

item.title: ... and called it the Holy Spirit
item.description: He Was Called Holy Ghost is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western-comedy film written and directed by Roberto Mauri and starring Vassili Karis. It was followed by Return of the Holy Ghost (1972), still directed by Mauri and with Karis in the title role.

item.title: The Longest Hunt
item.description: Spara, Gringo, spara is a 1968 Italian spaghetti western directed by Bruno Corbucci.
